name: Globe Lunch 2
description: This Globe Lunch 2 recipe is a perfect match for those seeking a high-protein, low-carb, and healthy meal. Combining tender beef, hearty eggs, and refreshing watermelon, it's not just a treat to your taste buds but also a step towards a healthier lifestyle. Ideal for anyone looking to keep their meal times both nutritious and delicious!

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the beef into small, bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Beat the eggs lightly in a bowl and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the watermelon into small cubes, removing any seeds.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the beef pieces in a pan over medium heat until browned and cooked through, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a separate pan, scramble the eggs until fully cooked, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the cooked beef and scrambled eggs together with the fresh watermelon cubes on the side.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
